information: Lenzing Plastics is the world's leading manufacturer of polyolefin and fluoropolymer products. As a manufacturer of thermoplastic and PTFE products, we are always looking for new challenges. One of our core competencies is the monoaxial stretching of films and filaments. We are as versatile as the material we work with. We offer special solutions in the fields of construction and insulation, medicine and hygiene, packaging, the cable industry, and automotive and technical textiles. Together with our customers from trade and industry, we are enthusiastic about the solutions of tomorrow.
